segments.text: I see the light pouring in through that window, illuminating everything in golden hue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It contrasts so sharply with the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is radiant in her routine, unaware of the storm brewing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy, on the edge of a tipping stool, seems to float in a world of his own.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand reaches deep into the cookie jar like it's a treasure chest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And there stands the girl, her whole being focused on that impending cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, as I watch, I canâ€™t shake the feeling that this is all about to come crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR
